title: Spoon, 1986-113-9, 1880
markings: On reverse of bowl, stamped: "[lion passant]/[anchor]/ G (Gorham mark)/ STERLING."
description: Square, spade-shaped bowl. Matte gilded obverse and reverse. Bowl with bright-cut engraving of Japanese design: two interlocking semicircular mo- tifs. Stem of square section. Fluted pointed acorn-shaped finial. Stem and finial of plain silver. Square spade-shaped bowl. Matte gilded obverse and reverse. Bowl bright-cut engraved with Japanese design: two interlocking semicirular motifs at upper left corner. Stem of square section. Fluted pointed acorn-shaped finial. Stem and finial of plain silver.

exhibitions.title: Feeding Desire: Design and the Tools of the Table, 1500-2005
